Header: A fire devastates a forest reserve
Content: A fire broken at the Aththala-pitiya forest reserve in Bandarawela has damaged a large chunk of the forest reserve. According to the Wild Life Conservation Department that the fire had broken out last evening. The Ella police, officers of the Disaster Management Unit, members of the Diyathalawa Army Camp and residents engaged in dousing the fire. Due to the current dry weather situation and strong winds the damage has been intensified. An officer attached to the Wild Life Conservation Department was admitted to the Diyathalawa Base hospital as he received minor injuries due to the disaster.
